metadata.title: CVE-2017-2807 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the tag parsingfunctionality of Ledger-CLI 3.1.1. A specially crafted journal file cancause an integer underflow resulting in code execution. An attacker canconstruct a malicious journal file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: ledger: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
